title: Tragedy at Astroworld: Who's Really at Fault?
itunes:title: Tragedy at Astroworld: Who's Really at Fault?
itunes:subtitle: From Security to Event Management to Conspiracy Theories
description:
Is it ominous that our 13th episode is about the Astroworld tragedy or is it just us getting paranoid? This week, Madi and Aleena go over what happened in Houston during the Astroworld concert, what could have led to the "crowd rushing", the potential of incompetence across event management and security and what this could all mean for Travis Scott.


We also get into some of the hard hitting questions: Do we think Travis and Kylie's apologies were genuine or naw? Should Travis be held responsible? And what about all of those WILD tik tok conspiracy theories?



Don't forget to follow us and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
